name: Thumbtext
description:
Thumbtext is a competitive splitscreen typing game that is played on a single keyboard. Each player will be given a random word and its up to them to construct and submit the corresponding letters in order to increase the damage dealt to the enemy, the longer and more accurate the answers are, the higher the damage will be dealt.

Each player has to correctly select and submit each letter of the word by moving the cursor to the correct letter in order to deal damage to the other player.

The controls are fairly simple and can be played in any keyboard except for small laptop keyboards that doesn't have a numpad,
